title: How I Made It Out Alive: My Devotional Journey to Freedom Over Fear and Depression
description: Depression is not a life sentence. Neither is fear. Singer/Songwriter Veronica Petrucci shares how she survived an almost suicide attempt at the peak of career with Dove Award winning duo, Angelo & Veronica. How I Made It Out Alive will take you on a devotional journey of how she overcame the depths of depression and fear, and became free. Throughout this journey, you will read step by step on how to experience freedom and gain strength and healing through this inspiring story.
author: Dr. Veronica Petrucci
